description:
The Shiiou University Society for the Study of Modern Visual Culture is also known as Genshiken. This comes from its Japanese name, the Gendai Shikaku Bunka Kenkyuukai.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Michi no Mukou, Yakusoku no Basho
The Other Side of the Path. The Promised Place.
道の向こう, 約束の場所
